name: The SOL Device
description:
Breaking free from stasis, you find yourself in an abandoned spaceship, full of hazards and mysteries. Using the Solid Optipartical Laser Device, you must journey your way across the ship, collecting new pieces of equipment as you go.

  • Use the Sol Device to climb to new heights.
  • Solve a variety of platforming-based puzzles, requiring both skill and thought.
  • Explore over 200 rooms.
  • Collect new devices and upgrades to expand your puzzle-solving capabilities.
  • Multiple ways to finish the game, of varying difficulty.
  • Unlockable hard mode and no-death mode.
  • Learn the secrets of your surroundings and the part you play in this world.
